main event: A witness observed a large white light object with colored lights moving slowly over the Long Island Sound near Stamford, Connecticut on July 28, 1957.
interesting points: The object was round with oval edges and emitted colors of red, blue, green, and white,The colors appeared to blink with precision and timing,Two similar phenomena appeared in the same location with similar characteristics,One object displayed four great jagged pieces of light that were significantly brighter than the rest,The sighting lasted from 9:40 p.m. to 10:05 p.m.
sighted object: large white light with colored lights
witness description: an observer who noted the detailed characteristics and behaviors of the object in the sky
